doc.after: Contemporary use of the word libre is mostly associated with liberation from restrictions on usage and sharing of works which are subject to copyright and other legal and technical limitations Works include knowledge and cultural resources such as works of art writing education music software and other resources typically in digital forms which are easily copied and distributed
